item.title: Keyboard portfolio
item.description: Recently I’ve been gettting a lot of requests and questions about mechanical keyboards. Mostly because of this one video. This one to be exact: Siin√§ vaiheessa kun @VilleErkkila sanoo, ett√§ sill√§ on hyv√§ idea, ei voi vaan kielt√§yty√§. Hymyilen √§√§neen t√§t√§ meid√§n pient√§ projektia üòÇ #kiehucreative #mechkeebs https://t.co/bHgIcgo6nj — Heikki Stark (@heikkistark) April 30, 2020 For this video, I want to give a short shoutout to Ville Erkkil√§ and Kiehu Creative for coming up with the idea and filming the amazing video.

item.title: About me
item.description: It’s a me, Heikki! My name is Heikki and I live in Finland. I am currently work as a information security specialist at Nixu Corporation, but during my free time I am part of a hacking team called LeftOvers. You can see me in multiple InfoSec related communities. If you happen to see me, please come say hi! In October 2020, I decided to start doing mechanical keyboard stuff (assemblying and fixing etc.
